long_description: Stay hydrated while logging miles on the trail. The Nathan VaporWrap Hydration vest offers a sculpted fit for all-day, chafe-free comfort and performance. Mesh shoulder straps and back panel channel air across your body and wick moisture away to improve overall comfort. Soft-touch, elastic perimeter keeps the vest in place. Zippered reservoir compartment zips open and provides quick access to 2 liter hydration bladder. Elastic cord on front lets you stash a shirt or lightweight shell on outside of pack while on the move. The Nathan VaporWrap vest features a zippered back pocket, 2 zippered pockets on shoulder straps, 2 zippered side pockets and 2 water bottle pockets on shoulder straps. Dual sternum straps keep vest close to body. Please note: for sizing, please order based on normal clothing size.
short_description: Stay hydrated while logging miles on the trail. The Nathan VaporWrap Hydration vest offers a sculpted fit for all-day, chafe-free comfort and performance.
